summary: In the port city of Icheon, five female friends struggle to stay close while forging a life for themselves after high school. When one of the group, upwardly-mobile Hae-ju, moves to Seoul, ... See full summary »
cast: Bae Doona|Yo-won Lee|Ji-young Ok|Eung-ju Lee|Eung-sil Lee|Tae-kyung Oh|Sang Seol Choi|Park Sung-Geun|Jung-hee Moon|Seok-jeong Hwang|Park Rina|Hwa-yeong Kim|Su-hyeon Kim|Tae-yeong Kim|Kim Kwang-gyu|Jin-yeong Park
title: Go-yang-i-leul boo-tak-hae
